pages.text: This feature refers to how some prey-like animals will run away from predators-like animals
Banana Slugs fear animals such as crows and bald eagles (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Alligator Snapping Turtle,Anaconda,Bald Eagle,Blue Jay,Caiman,Capuchin Monkey,Crocodile,Crow,Emu,Froststalker,Gelada Monkey,Gorilla,Grizzly Bear,Komodo Dragon
Raccoon runs from animals such as grizzly bears but will fight back once attacked (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Alligator Snapping Turtle,Anaconda,Bald Eagle,Caiman,Capuchin Monkey,Crocodile,Froststalker,Grizzly Bear,Komodo Dragon
Jerboa flee from predators like rattlesnakes (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Alligator Snapping Turtle,Anaconda,Bald Eagle,Blue Jay,Caiman,Capuchin Monkey,Crocodile,Crow,Froststalker,Grizzly Bear,Komodo Dragon,Rattlesnake,Roadrunner
Rainfrog scatter away from its hunters like crows (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Alligator Snapping Turtle,Anaconda,Bald Eagle,Blue Jay,Caiman,Capuchin Monkey,Crocodile,Crow,Froststalker,Grizzly Bear,Komodo Dragon,Rattlesnake
Blobfish swim away from players and giant squid (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Sugar Glider glides off from players and giant squid (Refer to the next page for the full list)
Alligator Snapping Turtle,Anaconda,Bald Eagle,Blue Jay,Caiman,Capuchin Monkey,Crocodile,Crow,Emu,Froststalker,Gelada Monkey,Gorilla,Grizzly Bear,Komodo Dragon
